parameters.name: AppType
parameters.description:
The type of application. Valid values:

*   `TRACE`: Application Monitoring
*   `EBPF`: Application Monitoring eBPF Edition

parameters.name: AppVersion
parameters.description: The application version. 1: Basic version, 2: Professional version.

parameters.name: EnableLog
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable logging. Valid values:

*   `true`: enabled
*   `false`: disabled

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The application ID. You can obtain the application ID on the Application Management page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: MonitorConfigJson
parameters.description: The configuration of the alert. The value is a JSON string. For more information about this parameter, see **Additional information about request parameters**.

parameters.name: MonitorContactsJson
parameters.description: The configuration of alert contacts. The value is a JSON string.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace ID. You can obtain the namespace ID on the Namespace page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: NamespaceSource
parameters.description: This parameter is not supported. You do not need to specify this parameter.

parameters.name: ScheduleBusyWorkers
parameters.description: Specifies whether to schedule a busy worker.
